pages.text: Fasioning weaponry out of the souls of the dead seems rather cruel, unethical, and downright horrendous at first, but if you think about it, you are giving these beings a purpose beyond death. That can't be a bad thing, now can it?

The Grimblade is a weapon constructed using a very large amount of souls. The result is a sword that can sever the connection between a soul and its body. Most anything slain by it will be unable to escape to whatever afterlife there may be, their soul staying in this world as an item. Due to its ethereal material, it can also harm Lost Souls.
